verses.verse: And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> rose <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning;<s%> and they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H4480>Shittim,<s%> <S%H7851><s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H3885>lodged<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> they passed <S%H5674>over.<s%>
And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> <S%H4480>after<s%> <S%H7097><s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> that the <S%H7860>officers<s%> <S%H5674>went<s%> <S%H7130>through<s%> the <S%H4264>host;<s%>

And they <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> When ye <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H5375>bearing<s%> it, then <S%H859>ye<s%> shall <S%H5265>remove<s%> from your <S%H4480>place,<s%> <S%H4725><s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> it.

Yet <S%H389><s%> there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H7350>space<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> you and it, about two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> by <S%H4060>measure:<s%> come not <S%H408>near<s%> <S%H7126><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> it, <S%H4616>that<s%> <S%H834><s%> ye may <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> ye must <S%H1980>go:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> ye have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> this <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H4480>heretofore.<s%> <S%H8543><s%> <S%H8032><s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> Sanctify <S%H6942>yourselves:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6381>wonders<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Take <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%> And they took <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> will I <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H1431>magnify<s%> thee in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> they may <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> I <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> so I will <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee.

And <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> When ye are <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H7097>brink<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> ye shall stand <S%H5975>still<s%> in <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5066>Come<s%> <S%H2008>hither,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2063>Hereby<s%> ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> is <S%H7130>among<s%> you, and that he will without fail drive <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H3423><s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H853>you<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and the <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> and the <S%H1622>Girgashites,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusites.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H113>Lord<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> passeth <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you into <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore <S%H3947>take<s%> you <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H376>men<s%> out of the <S%H4480>tribes<s%> <S%H7626><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> out of every tribe a <S%H376>man.<s%> <S%H259><s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H259><s%> <S%H7626><s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> as soon as the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H113>Lord<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> shall <S%H5117>rest<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H4325>waters<s%> that come <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H4480>above;<s%> <S%H4605><s%> and they shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> upon <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H5067>heap.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5265>removed<s%> from their <S%H4480>tents,<s%> <S%H168><s%> to pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5375>bearing<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people;<s%>

And as they that <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> were <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> were <S%H2881>dipped<s%> in the <S%H7097>brim<s%> of the <S%H4325>water,<s%> (for <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H4390>overfloweth<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1415>banks<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>time<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest,)<s%>

That the <S%H4325>waters<s%> which came <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> and rose <S%H6965>up<s%> upon <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H5067>heap<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H4480>Adam,<s%> <S%H121><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H4480>beside<s%> <S%H6654><s%> <S%H6891>Zaretan:<s%> and those that came <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of the <S%H6160>plain,<s%> even the <S%H4417>salt<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H8552>failed,<s%> and were cut <S%H3772>off:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%> right <S%H5048>against<s%> <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H3559>firm<s%> on dry <S%H2724>ground<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%> on dry <S%H2724>ground,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>people<s%> were <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H8552>clean<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>
